dataList.name: Dueling
dataList.desc:
When HP falls below 50%, uses a special skill to target 1 unit, then becomes immune to Stagger and Panic for the next 2 turns.
If Yi Sang has 'Dueling', Dongbaek gains 1 Attack Power Up.
If Yi Sang wins the duel, all allies ได้รับ 3 Damage Up ในเทิร์นถัดไป.
If Dongbaek wins the duel, Dongbaek fully heals SP.

dataList.name: I am yet to hear your answer.
dataList.desc:
ทุกครั้งที่เริ่มเทิร์น: Core and Part ได้รับ 900 Shield.
- When the unit with the earliest Deployment order has [Teaching], lose 300 Shield per Stack
- When the unit with the earliest Deployment order has 3+ [Teaching], this unit does not ได้รับ Shield for the rest of the Encounter

dataList.name: Watch this little girl...!
dataList.desc: If there are this unit's summoned units เมื่อเริ่มเทิร์น, heal 10 SP

dataList.name: Tigermark Round Reload
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: at 90% or less HP, or at the end of the 2nd turn, reload [BulletPropellant] และได้รับ a new pattern ในเทิร์นถัดไป
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Lei Heng [雷橫]
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: at 80% or less HP, or at the end of the 4th turn, ได้รับ a new pattern ในเทิร์นถัดไป
- Use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver'), repeat every 3rd turn. +10 to Min & Max Speed for turns in which this unit uses this Skill
- At the start of that turn, ได้รับ 25 [BattleSense]
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Tiantui Star [天退星]
dataList.desc:
If this unit's HP dropped to 60% or below at จบเทิร์น, or if this unit is set to use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver') ในเทิร์นถัดไป for the second time this Encounter, ได้รับ a new pattern ในเทิร์นถัดไป
- When thเมื่อเริ่มเทิร์นs, ได้รับ 1 [Irritation]
- When thเมื่อเริ่มเทิร์นs, ได้รับ 18 [BulletPropellantSpecial] and reload immediately
· If this unit spends all [BulletPropellantSpecial], convert the effect to [BulletPropellant] and summon 2 of "Rigid Soldato of the Thumb" units ในเทิร์นถัดไป and have them supply this unit with [BulletPropellantSpecial]
- When Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Lei Heng, The Pinky's Tiantui Star
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: at 40% or less HP, or if this unit is set to use a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver') ในเทิร์นถัดไป for the third time this Encounter, ได้รับ a new pattern ในเทิร์นถัดไป
- Replace the powerful attack 'Tanglecleaver' with 'Savage Tigerslayer's Perfected Flurry of Blades'. +15 to Min & Max Speed for turns in which this unit uses this Skill
- Convert [BattleSense] to [RestoredBattleSense]
- Convert [Irritation] to [DerivativeHugeIrritation]
- If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

dataList.name: Tiantui Star's Blade - Overheat
dataList.desc: If this unit used a powerful attack ('Tanglecleaver' or 'Savage Tigerslayer's Perfected Flurry of Blades'), ได้รับ [Complacency] ในเทิร์นถัดไป เท่ากับ the number of times those skills were used (สูงสุด 5)

dataList.name: I'm Stuffed
dataList.desc:
At 10+ [FullCharon]...
- เริ่มเทิร์น: enter a forced Stagger State (for a turn)
- จบเทิร์น: remove [HungryCharon] and [FullCharon] completely

dataList.name: Vroom-vroom. Angry now
dataList.desc:
Combat Start: Vergilius gains 1 [HungryCharon]
At 3 [HungryCharon], uses a devastating attack ("Vroom-Vroom")
※ Does not activate at "Combat Start" if this unit is Staggered due to [FullCharon]

dataList.name: Got Candy?
dataList.desc: เริ่มเทิร์น: in Deployment Order, สร้าง 1 [GiveMeCandy] against 1 enemy without [GiveMeCandy]

dataList.name: Kkomi's not a Piñata
dataList.desc: สร้าง 1 [GiveMeCandy] to the target who attacked Kkomi

dataList.name: Shattering, Scattering Hardblood
dataList.desc: When this unit is killed due to enemy attack or Status effect damage, increase [BloodDinner] by 30. Does not activate if this unit killed itself.

dataList.name: Memories of the Journeys Past
dataList.desc: Apply special effect to all allies

dataList.name: Memories of the Journeys Past
dataList.desc: เริ่มเทิร์น: สร้าง 3 [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count against all enemies

dataList.name: Memories of the Journeys Past
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: Apply 1 [RegainedStrength] on Don Quixote
